thread.section_title: Rapid TV News - Broadcast Technology Daily
thread.title: Rovi, Time Warner Cable extend IPG licence agreement
thread.title_full: Rovi, Time Warner Cable extend IPG licence agreement

title: Rovi, Time Warner Cable extend IPG licence agreement
text:
Michelle Clancy | 30 September 2015 
TV experience firm Rovi has extended its interactive programme guide licence agreement with Time Warner Cable. 
The extension covers both distribution and patent licensing. 
Rovi's guides, metadata and recommendations drive programme search and navigation on millions of devices. With a new generation of cloud-based discovery capabilities and emerging solutions for interactive advertising and audience analytics, Rovi holds over 5,000 issued or pending patents worldwide. It recently signed a similar deal with Comcast. 
"We are pleased to continue our business relationship with Time Warner Cable," said Tom Carson, Rovi president and CEO.
